001package io.jstach.jstachio.spi;
002
003import static io.jstach.jstachio.spi.Templates.sneakyThrow;
004
005import java.io.IOException;
006import java.io.UncheckedIOException;
007
008import io.jstach.jstachio.JStachio;
009import io.jstach.jstachio.Template;
010import io.jstach.jstachio.TemplateInfo;
011import io.jstach.jstachio.spi.JStachioFilter.FilterChain;
012
013/**
014 * An abstract jstachio that just needs a {@link JStachioExtensions} container.
015 * <p>
016 * To extend just override {@link #extensions()}.
017 *
018 * @see JStachioExtensions
019 * @author agentgt
020 */
021public abstract class AbstractJStachio implements JStachio, JStachioExtensions.Provider {
022
023        /**
024         * Do nothing constructor
025         */
026        public AbstractJStachio() {
027
028        }
029
030        @Override
031        public void execute(Object model, Appendable appendable) throws IOException {
032                TemplateInfo template = template(model.getClass());
033                var filter = loadFilter(model, template);
034                filter.process(model, appendable);
035
036        }
037
038        @Override
039        public Template<?> findTemplate(Object model) throws IOException {
040                TemplateInfo template = template(model.getClass());
041                var filter = loadFilter(model, template);
042                return filter.toTemplate(template);
043        }
044
045        /**
046         * Loads the filter and checks if it can process the model and template.
047         * @param model to render
048         * @param template loaded by {@link #template(Class)}
049         * @return filter chain that can process model
050         * @throws IOException if the filter cannot process the model
051         */
052        protected FilterChain loadFilter(Object model, TemplateInfo template) throws IOException {
053                var filter = extensions().getFilter().filter(template);
054                if (filter.isBroken(model)) {
055                        boolean isReflectiveTemplate = Templates.isReflectionTemplate(template);
056                        final String ind = "\n\t";
057                        String reason = "";
058                        if (isReflectiveTemplate) {
059                                reason = " This is usually because the template "
060                                                + "has not been compiled and reflection based rendering is not available.";
061                        }
062                        throw new BrokenFilterException( //
063                                        "Filter chain unable to process template/model." + reason //
064                                                        + ind + "template: \"" + template.description() + "\"" //
065                                                        + ind + "model type: \"" + model.getClass() + "\"" //
066                                                        + ind + "reflection used: \"" + isReflectiveTemplate + "\"");
067                }
068                return filter;
069        }
070
071        @Override
072        public StringBuilder execute(Object model, StringBuilder sb) {
073                try {
074                        execute(model, (Appendable) sb);
075                        return sb;
076                }
077                catch (IOException e) {
078                        sneakyThrow(e);
079                        throw new UncheckedIOException(e);
080                }
081        }
082
083        @Override
084        public String execute(Object model) {
085                return execute(model, new StringBuilder()).toString();
086        }
087
088        @Override
089        public boolean supportsType(Class<?> modelType) {
090                return extensions().getTemplateFinder().supportsType(modelType);
091        }
092
093        /**
094         * Finds the template by model class
095         * @param modelType the class of the model.
096         * @return found template never <code>null</code>.
097         */
098        protected TemplateInfo template(Class<?> modelType) {
099                try {
100                        return extensions().getTemplateFinder().findTemplate(modelType);
101                }
102                catch (Exception e) {
103                        sneakyThrow(e);
104                        throw new RuntimeException(e);
105                }
106        }
107
108}
109
110class DefaultJStachio extends AbstractJStachio {
111
112        private final JStachioExtensions extensions;
113
114        public DefaultJStachio(JStachioExtensions extensions) {
115                super();
116                this.extensions = extensions;
117        }
118
119        @Override
120        public JStachioExtensions extensions() {
121                return this.extensions;
122        }
123
124}
